juzs.text: Alipha-la-ma-ra; egulo paripurna grantha o suspasta kora'anera ayata.
Kona samaya kapherara akanksa karabe ye, ki camatkara hata, yadi tara musalamana hata.
Apani chere dina taderake, kheye nika ebam bhoga kare nika ebam asaya byaprta thakuka. Ati satbara tara jene nebe.
Ami kona janapada dhabansa karini; kinta tara nirdista samaya likhita chila.
Kona sampradaya tara nirdista samayera agre yaya na ebam pascate thake na.
Tara balalah he ai byakti, yara prati kora'ana nayila hayeche, apani to ekajana um'mada.
Yadi apani satyabadi hana, tabe amadera kache pheresataderake anena na kena
ami pheresataderake ekamatra phayasalara jan'ye'i nayila kari. Takhana taderake abakasa deya habe na.
Ami sbayam e upadesa grantha abatarana karechi ebam ami nije'i era sanraksaka.
Ami apanara purbe purbabarti sampradayera madhye rasula prerana karechi.
Odera kache emana kona rasula asenani, yadera sathe ora thattabidrupa karate thakeni.
Emanibhabe ami e dharanera acarana papidera antare bad'dhamula kare de'i.
Ora era prati bisbasa karabe na. Purbabartidera emana riti cale asache.
Yadi ami odera samane akasera kona daraja'o khule de'i ara tate ora dinabhara arohana o karate thake.
Tabu'o ora ekatha'i balabe ye, amadera drstira bibhrata ghatano hayeche na baram amara yadugrasta haye parechi.
Niscaya ami akase rasicakra srsti karechi ebam take darsakadera jan'ye susobhita kare diyechi.
Ami akasake pratyeka bitarita sayatana theke nirapada kare diyechi.
Kintu ye curi kare sune palaya, tara pascad'dhabana kare ujjbala ulkapinda.
Ami bhu-prsthake bistrta karechi ebam tara upara parbatamala sthapana karechi ebam tate pratyeka bastu suparimitabhabe utpanna karechi.
Ami tomadera jan'ye tate jibikara upakarana srsti karachi ebam tadera jan'ye'o yadera annadata tomara na'o.
Amara kache pratyeka bastura bhandara rayeche. Ami nirdista parimane'i ta abatarana kari.
Ami brstigarbha bayu paricalana kari atahpara akasa theke pani barsana kari, erapara tomaderake ta pana kara'i. Bastutah tomadera kache era bhandara ne'i.
Ami'i jibanadana kari, mrtyudana kari ebam ami'i curanta malikanara adhikari.
Ami jene rekhechi tomadera agragamiderake ebam ami jene rekhechi pascadagamiderake.
Apanara palanakarta'i taderake ekatrita kare anabena. Niscaya tini prajnabana, jnanamaya.
Ami manabake paca kardama theke tairi bisuska thanathane mati dbara srsti karechi.
Ebam jinake era age lu era agunera dbara srjita karechi.
Ara apanara palanakarta yakhana pheresataderake balalenah ami paca kardama theke tairi bisuska thanathane mati dbara srsta ekati manaba jatira pattana karaba.
Atahpara yakhana take thikathaka kare neba ebam tate amara ruha theke phamuka deba, takhana tomara tara samane sejadaya pare yeyo.
Takhana pheresatara saba'i mile sejada karala.
Kintu ibalisa-se sejadakaridera antarbhukta hate sbikrta hala na.
Allaha balalenah he ibalisa, tomara ki halo ye tumi sejadakaridera antarbhukta hate sbikrta hale na
Balalah ami emana na'i ye, ekajana manabake sejada karaba, yake apani paca kardama theke tairi thanathane bisuska mati dbara srsti karechena.
Allaha balalenah tabe tumi ekhana theke bera haye ya'o. Tumi bitarita.
Ebam tomara prati n'yaya bicarera dina paryanta abhisampata.
Se balalah he amara palanakarta, apani amake punarut'thana dibasa paryanta abakasa dina.
Allaha balalenah tomake abakasa deya hala.
Se'i abadharita samaya upasthita ha'oyara dina paryanta.
Se balalah he amara palanakarta, apani yemana amake patha bhrasta karechena, ami'o tadera saba'ike prthibite nana saundarye akrsta karaba ebam tadera saba'ike patha bhrastha kare deba.
Apanara manonita bandadera byatita.
Allaha balalenah eta ama paryanta soja patha.
Yara amara banda, tadera upara tomara kona ksamata ne'i; kintu pathabhrantadera madhya theke yara tomara pathe cale.
Tadera sabara nirdharita sthana hacche jahannama.
Era satati daraja ache. Pratyeka darajara jan'ye eka ekati prthaka dala ache.
Niscaya khodabhirura bagana o nirjharinisahuhe thakabe.
Bala habeh egulote nirapatta o santi sahakare prabesa kara.
Tadera antare ye krodha chila, ami ta dura kare deba. Tara bha'i bha'iyera mata samana-samani asane basabe.
Sekhane tadera mote'i kasta habe na ebam tara sekhana theke bahiskrta habe na.
Apani amara bandaderake janiye dina ye, ami atyanta ksamasila dayalu.
Ebam iha'o ye, amara sasti'i yantranadayaka sasti.
Apani taderake ibrahimera mehamanadera abastha suniye dina.
Yakhana tara tamra grhe agamana karala ebam balalah salama. Tini balalenah amara tomadera byapare bhita.
Tara balalah bhaya karabena na. Amara apanake ekajana jnanabana chele-santanera susambada dicchi.
Tini balalenah tomara ki amake ematabasthaya susambada diccha, yakhana ami bardhakye pauche gechi
Tara balalah amara apanake satya su-sambada dicchi! Ata'eba apani nirasa habena na.
Tini balalenah palanakartara rahamata theke pathabhrastara chara ke nirasa haya
tini balalenah atahpara tomadera pradhana uddesya ki he allahara preritagana
tara balalah amara ekati aparadhi sampradayera prati prerita hayechi.
Kintu lutera paribara-parijana. Amara abasya'i tadera saba'ike bamciye neba.
Tabe tara stri. Amara sthira karechi ye, se theke ya'oyadera dalabhukta habe.
Atahpara yakhana preritara lutera grhe pauchala.
Tini balalenah tomara to aparicita loka.
Tara balalah na baram amara apanara kache ai bastu niye esechi, ye samparke tara bibada karata.
Ebam amara apanara kache satya bisaya niye esechi ebam amara satyabadi.

Ata'eba apani sesaratre paribarera sakalake niye cale yana ebam apani tadera pascadanusarana karabena na ebam apanadera madhye ke'u yena pichana phire na dekhe. Apanara yekhane adesa prapta hacchena sekhane yana.
Ami lutake e bisaya parijnata kare de'i ye, sakala hale'i taderake samule binasa kare deya habe.
Saharabasira ananda-ullasa karate karate pauchala.
Luta balalenah tara amara mehamana. Ata'eba amake lanchita karo na.
Tomara allahake bhaya kara ebam amara iyayata nasta karo na.
Tara balalah amara ki apanake jagatdbasira samarthana karate nisedha karini.
Tini balalenah yadi tomara ekanta kichu karate'i ca'o, tabe amara kan'yara upasthita ache.
Apanara pranera kasama, tara apana nesaya pramatta chila.
Atahpara suryodayera samaya taderake pracanda ekati sabda ese pakara'o karala.
Atahpara ami janapadatike ulte dilama ebam tadera upara kankarera prasthara barsana karalama.
Niscaya ete cintasiladera jan'ye nidarsanabali rayeche.
Janapadati soja pathe abasthita rayeche.
Niscaya ete imanadaradera jan'ye nidarsana ache.
Niscaya gahina banera adhibasira papi chila.
Atahpara ami tadera kacha theke pratisodha niyechi. Ubhaya basti prakasya rastara upara abasthita.
Niscaya hijarera basindara payagambaraganera prati mithyaropa kareche.
Ami taderake nijera nidarsanabali diyechi. Atahpara tara egulo theke mukha phiriye neya.
Tara pahare niscinte ghara khoda'i karata.
Atahpara eka pratyuse tadera upara ekata sabda ese aghata karala.
Takhana kona upakare asala na ya tara uparjana karechila.
Ami nabhomandala, bhumandala ebam etadubhayera madhyabarti ya ache ta tatparyahina srsti karini. Keyamata abasya'i asabe. Ata'eba parama audasin'yera sathe odera kriyakarma upakso karuna.
Niscaya apanara palanakarta'i srasta, sarbajna.
Ami apanake satati bara bara pathitabya ayata ebam mahana kora'ana diyechi.

Apani caksu tule ai bastura prati dekhabena na, ya ami tadera madhye kayeka prakara lokake bhoga karara jan'ye diyechi, tadera jan'ye cintita habena na ara imanadaradera jan'ye sbiya bahu nata karuna.
Ara balunah ami prakasya bhaya pradarsaka.
Yemana ami nayila karechi yara bibhinna mate bibhakta tadera upara.
Yara kora'anake khanda khanda kareche.
Ata'eba apanara palanakartara kasama, ami abasya'i odera saba'ike jijnasabada karaba.
Odera kajakarma samparke.
Ata'eba apani prakasye suniye dina ya apanake adesa kara haya ebam musarikadera para'oya karabena na.
Bidrupakaridera jan'ye ami apanara paksa theke yathesta.
Yara allahara sathe an'ya upasya sabyasta kare. Ata'eba atisattara tara jene nebe.
Ami jani ye apani tadera kathabartaya hatodyama haye parena.
Ata'eba apani palanakartara saundarya smarana karuna ebam sejadakaridera antarbhukta haye yana.
Ebam palanakartara ebadata karuna, ye paryanta apanara kache niscita katha na ase.
Allahara nirdesa ese geche. Ata'eba era jan'ye tarahura karo na. Ora yesaba sarika sabyasta karache sesaba theke tini pabitra o bahu urdhbe.
Tini sbiya nirdese bandadera madhye yara kache iccha, nirdesasaha pheresataderake e'i marme nayila karena ye, husiyara kare da'o, ami chara kona upasya ne'i. Ata'eba amake bhaya kara.
Yini yathabidhi akasaraji o bhu-mandala srsti karechena. Tara yake sarika kare tini tara bahu urdhbe.
Tini manabake eka phota birya theke srsti karechena. Etadasatbe'o se prakasya bitandakari haye geche.
Catuspada jantuke tini srsti karechena. Ete tomadera jan'ye sita bastrera upakarana ache. Ara aneka upakara hayeche ebam kichu sankhyakake tomara aharye?2474;Rinata kare thaka.
Edera dbara tomadera sam'mana haya, yakhana bikale caranabhumi theke niye asa ebam sakale carana bhumite niye ya'o.
Era tomadera bojha emana sahara paryanta bahana kare niye yaya, yekhane tomara pranantakara parisraۦ#2478; byatita pauchate parate na. Niscaya tomadera prabhu atyanta dayadra, parama dayalu.
Tomadera arohanera jan'ye ebam sobhara jan'ye tini ghora, khaccara o gadha srsti karechena. Ara tini emana jinisa srsti karena ya tomara jana na.
Sarala patha allaha paryanta pauche ebam pathagulora madhye kichu bakra patha'o rayeche. Tini iccha karale tomadera saba'ike satpathe paricalita karate paratena.
Tini tomadera jan'ye akasa theke pani barsana karechena. E'i pani theke tomara pana kara ebam e theke'i udbhida utpanna haya, yate tomara pasucarana kara.
E pani dbara tomadera jan'ye utpadana karena phasala, yayatuna, khejura, angura o sarbaprakara phala. Niscaya ete cintasiladera jan'ye nidarsana rayeche.
Tini'i tomadera kaje niyojita karechena ratri, dina, surya ebam candrake. Tarakasamuha tamra'i bidhanera karme niyojita rayeche. Niscaya'i ete bodhasaktisampannadera jan'ye nidarsanabali rayeche.
Tomadera jan'ye prthibite yesaba ram-beranera bastu chariye diyechena, segulote nidarsana rayeche tadera jan'ye yara cinta-bhabana kare.

Tini'i kaje lagiye diyechena samudrake, yate ta theke tomara taja mansa khete para ebam ta theke bera karate para paridheya alankara. Tumi tate jalayana samuhake pani cire calate dekhabe ebam yate tomara allahara krpa anbesana kara ebam yate tara anugraha sbikara kara.
Ebam tini prthibira upara bojha rekhechena ye, kakhano yena ta tomaderake niye hele-dule na pare ebam nadi o patha tairi karechena, yate tomara patha pradarsita ha'o.
Ebam tini patha nirnayaka bahu cihna srsti karechena, ebam taraka dbara o manusa pathera nirdesa paya.
Yini srsti kare, tini ki se lokera samatulya ye srsti karate pare na? Tomara ki cinta karabe na
yadi allahara neyamata ganana kara, sesa karate parabe na. Niscaya allaha ksamasila, dayalu.
Allaha janena ya tomara gopana kara ebam ya tomara prakasa kara.
Ebam yara allahake chere an'yadera dake, ora to kona bastu'i srsti kare na; baram ora nijera'i srjita.
Tara mrta-pranahina ebam kabe punarut'thita habe, jane na.
Amadera ilaha ekaka ilaha. Anantara yara parajibane bisbasa kare na, tadera antara satyabimukha ebam tara ahankara pradarsana kareche.
Nihsandehe allaha tadera gopana o prakasya yabatiya bisaye abagata. Niscita'i tini ahankaridera pachanda karena na.
Yakhana taderake bala hayah tomadera palanakarta ki nayila karechena? Tara baleh purbabartidera kisasa-kahini.
Phale keyamatera dina ora purnamatraya bahana karabe odera papabhara ebam papabhara tadera'o yaderake tara tadera ajnatahetu bipathagami kare sune na'o, khuba'i nikrsta bojha ya tara bahana kare.

Niscaya cakranta kareche tadera purbabartira, atahpara allaha tadera cakrantera imaratera bhittimule aghata karechilena. Erapara upara theke tadera mathaya chada dhbase pare geche ebam tadera upara ayaba eseche yekhana theke tadera dharana chila na.

Atahpara keyamatera dina tini taderake lanchita karabena ebam balabenah amara ansidarara kothaya, yadera byapare tomara khuba hathakarita karate? Yara jnanaprapta hayechila tara balabeh niscaya'i ajakera dine lanchana o durgati kapheradera jan'ye

pheresatara tadera jana emata'abasthaya kabaja kare ye, tara nijedera upara yuluma kareche. Takhana tara anugatya prakasa karabe ye, amara to kona manda kaja karatama na. Hamya niscaya allaha sababisaya abagata achena, ya tomara karate.
Ata'eba, jahannamera darajasamuhe prabesa kara, ete'i anantakala basa kara. Ara ahankaridera abasasthala kata'i nikrsta.

Paraheyagaraderake bala hayah tomadera palanakarta ki nayila karechena? Tara baleh mahakalyana. Yara e jagate satkaja kare, tadera jan'ye kalyana rayeche ebam parakalera grha ara'o uttama. Paraheyagaradera grha ki camatkara
sarbada basabasera udyana, tara yate prabesa karabe. Era padadese diye srotasbini prabahita haya tadera jan'ye tate ta-i rayeche, ya tara caya emanibhabe pratidana debena allahara paraheyagaraderake
pheresata yadera jana kabaja karena tadera pabitra thaka abasthaya. Pheresatara baleh tomadera prati sasti barsita hoka. Tomara ya karate, tara pratidane jannate prabesa kara.

Kapherara ki ekhana apeksa karache ye, tadera kache pheresatara asabe kimba apanara palanakartara nirdesa pauchabe? Tadera purbabartira emana'i karechila. Allaha tadera prati abicara karenani; kintu tara sbayam nijedera prati juluma karechila.
Sutaram tadera manda kajera sasti tadera'i mathaya apatita hayeche ebam tara ye thatta bidrupa karata, ta'i ulte tadera upara pareche.

Musarikara balalah yadi allaha ca'itena, tabe amara tamke chara kara'o ebadata karatama na ebam amadera pitrpurusera'o karata na ebam tamra nirdesa chara kona bastu'i amara harama karatama na. Tadera purbabartira emana'i kareche. Rasulera dayitba to sudhumatra suspasta bani pauchiye deya.

Ami pratyeka um'matera madhye'i rasula prerana karechi e'i marme ye, tomara allahara ebadata kara ebam taguta theke nirapada thaka. Atahpara tadera madhye kichu sankhyakake allaha hedayeta karechena ebam kichu sankhyakera jan'ye bipathagamita abadharita haye gela. Sutaram tomara prthibite bhramana kara ebam dekha mithyaropakaridera kirupa parinati hayeche.
Apani taderake supathe anate agrahi hale'o allaha yake bipathagami karena tini take patha dekhana na ebam tadera kona sahayyakari o ne'i.
Tara allahara name kathora sapatha kare ye, yara mrtyu haya allaha take punarujjibita karabena na. Abasya'i era pakapokta oyada haye geche. Kintu, adhikansa loka jane na.
Tini punarujjibita karabena'i, yate ye bisaye tadera madhye matanaikya chila ta prakasa kara yaya ebam yate kapherera jene neya ye, tara mithyabadi chila.
Ami yakhana kona kichu karara iccha kari; takhana take kebala etatuku'i bali ye, haye ya'o,. Sutaram ta haye yaya.
Yara niryatita ha'oyara para allahara jan'ye grhatyaga kareche, ami abasya'i taderake duniyate uttama abasa deba ebam parakalera puraskara to sarbadhika; haya! Yadi tara janata.
Yara drrhapada rayeche ebam tadera palanakartara upara bharasa kareche.
Apanara purbe'o ami pratyadesasaha manabake'i tadera prati prerana karechilama ata'eba jnaniderake jijnesa kara, yadi tomadera jana na thake

prerana karechilama taderake niꦣ2503;dasabali o abatirna granthasaha ebam apanara kache ami smaranika abatirna karechi, yate apani lokadera samane aisaba bisaya bibrta karena, ye gulo todera prati nayila kara hayeche, yate tara cinta-bhabana kare.
Yara kucakra kare, tara ki e bisaye bhaya kare na ye, allaha taderake bhugarbhe bilina kare dibena kimba tadera kache emana jayaga theke ayaba asabe ya tadera dharanatita.
Kimba calapherara madhye'i taderake pakara'o karabe, tara to ta byartha karate parabe na.
Kimba bhiti pradarsanera para taderake pakara'o karabena? Tomadera palanakarta to atyanta namra, dayalu.
Tara ki allahara srjita bastu dekhe na, yara chaya allahara prati binitabhabe sejadabanata theke dana o bama dike jhumke pare.
Allahake sejada kare ya kichu nabhomandale ache ebam ya kichu bhumandale ache ebam pheresatagana; tara ahankara kare na.
Tara tadera upara parakramasali tadera palanakartake bhaya kare ebam tara ya adesa paya, ta kare
allaha balalenah tomara du'i upasya grahana karo na upasya to matra ekajana'i. Ata'eba amake'i bhaya kara.
Ya kichu nabhomandala o bhumandale ache ta tamra'i ebadata kara sasbata kartabya. Tomara ki allaha byatita ka'uke bhaya karabe
tomadera kache ye samasta neyamata ache, ta allahara'i paksa theke. Atahpara tomara yakhana duhkhe-kaste patita ha'o takhana tamra'i nikata kannakati kara.
Erapara yakhana allaha tomadera kasta duribhuta kare dena, takhana'i tomadera ekadala sbiya palanakartara sathe ansidara sabyasta karate thake.
Yate ai neyamata asbikara kare, ya ami taderake diyechi. Ata'eba maja bhoga kare na'o-satbara'i tomara janate parabe.

Tara amara deya jibanopakarana theke tadera jan'ye ekati ansa nirdharita kare, yadera kona khabara'i tara rakhe na. Allahara kasama, tomara ye apabada aropa karacha, se samparke abasya'i jijnasita habe.
Tara allahara jan'ye kan'ya santana nirdharana kare-tini pabitra mahimanbita ebam nijedera jan'ye ora ta'i sthira kare ya ora caya.
Yakhana tadera ka'uke kan'ya santanera susambada deya haya, takhana tara mukha kala haye yaya ebam asahya manastape klista hate thake.

Take sonano susambadera duhkhe se lokadera kacha theke mukha lukiye thake. Se bhabe, apamana sahya kare take thakate debe, na take matira nice pute phelabe. Sune rakha, tadera phayasala khuba'i nikrsta.
Yara parakala bisbasa kare na, tadera udaharana nikrsta ebam allahara udaharana'i mahana, tini parakramasali, prajnamaya.

Yadi allaha lokaderake tadera an'yaya kajera karane pakara'o karatena, tabe bhuprsthe calamana kona kichuke'i charatena na. Kintu tini pratisruti samaya paryanta taderake abakasa dena. Atahpara nirdharita samaye yakhana tadera mrtyu ese yabe, takhana eka muhurta'o bilambita kimba tarambita karate parabe na.

Ya nijedera mana caya na tara'i tara allahara jan'ye sabyasta kare ebam tadera jihaba mithya barnana kare ye, tadera jan'ye rayeche kalyana. Sbatahsid'dha katha ye, tadera jan'ye rayeche aguna ebam taderake'i sarbagre niksepa kara habe.

Allahara kasama, ami apanara purbe bibhinna sampradaye rasula prerana karechi, atahpara sayatana taderake karma samuha sobhaniya kare dekhiyeche. Aja se'i tadera abhibhabaka ebam tadera jan'ye rayeche yantranadayaka sasti.

Ami apanara prati e jan'ye'i grantha nayila karechi, yate apani sarala patha pradarsanera jan'ye tadera ke pariskara barnana kare dena, ye bisaye tara matabirodha karache ebam imanadarake ksama karara jan'ye.
Allaha akasa theke pani barsana karechena, tadbara yaminake tara mrtyura para punarjibita karechena. Niscaya ete tadera jan'ye nidarsana rayeche, yara srabana kare.

Tomadera jan'ye catuspada jantudera madhye cinta karara abakasa rayeche. Ami tomaderake pana kara'i tadera udarasthita bastusamuhera madhye theke gobara o rakta nihsrta dugdha ya panakaridera jan'ye upadeya.
Ebam khejura brksa o angura phala theke tomara madhya o uttama khadya tairi kare thaka, ete abasya'i bodhasakti sampanna sampradayera jan'ye nidarsana rayeche.
Apanara palanakarta madhu maksikake adesa dilenah parbatagahre, brksa ebam umcu cale grha tairi kara

erapara sarbaprakara phala theke bhaksana kara ebam apana palanakartara um'mukta patha samuhe calamana ha'o. Tara peta theke bibhinna rane paniya nirgata haya. Tate manusera jan'ye rayeche rogera pratikara. Niscaya ete cintasila sampradayera jan'ye nidarsana rayeche.

Allaha tomaderake srsti karechena erapara tomadera mrtyudana karena. Tomadera madhye ke'u ke'u pauche yaya jaragrasta akarman'ya bayase, phale ya kichu tara janata se samparke tara sajnana thakabe na. Niscaya allaha su-bijna sarbasaktimana.

Allaha ta’ala jibanopakarane tomadera ekajanake an'yajanera ca'ite srestatba diyechena. Ata'eba yaderake sresthatba deya hayeche, tara tadera adhinastha dasa-dasiderake sbiya jibika theke emana kichu deya na, yate tara e bisaye tadera samana haye yabe. Tabe ki tara allahara neyamata asbikara kare.

Allaha tomadera jan'ye tomadera'i sreni theke jora payada karechena ebam tomadera yugala theke tomaderake putra o pautradi diyechena ebam tomaderake uttama jibanopakarana dana karechena. Ata'eba tara ki mithya bisaye bisbasa sthapana kare ebam allahara anugraha asbikara kare
tara allaha byatita emana bastura ibadata kare, ye tadera jan'ye bhumandala o nabhomandala theke saman'ya ruyi de'oyara o adhikara rakhe na ebam mukti o rakhe na.
Ata'eba, allahara kona sadrsa sabyasta karo na, niscaya allaha janena ebam tomara jana na.

Allaha ekati drstanta barnana karechena, aparera malikanadhina golamera ye, kona kichura upara sakti rakhe na ebam emana ekajana yake ami nijera paksa theke camatkara ruyi diyechi. Ata'eba, se ta theke byaya kare gopane o prakasye ubhaye ki samana haya? Saba prasansa allahara, kintu aneka manusa jane na.

Allaha arekati drstanta barnana karechena, du’byaktira, ekajana boba kona kaja karate pare na. Se malikera upara bojha. Yedike take pathaya, kona sathika kaja kare ase na. Se ki samana habe ai byaktira, ye n'yaya bicarera adesa kare ebam sarala pathe kayema rayeche.

Nabhomandala o bhumandalera gopana rahasya allahara kache'i rayeche. Kiyamatera byaparati to emana, yemana cokhera palaka athaba tara ca'ite'o nikatabarti. Niscaya allaha saba kichura upara saktimana.
Allaha tomaderake tomadera mayera garbha theke bera karechena. Tomara kichu'i janate na. Tini tomaderake karna, caksu o antara diyechena, yate tomara anugraha sbikara kara.
Tara ki uranta pakhike dekhe na? Egulo akasera antarikse ajnadhina rayeche. Allaha chara ke'u eguloke agale rakhe na. Niscaya ete bisbasidera jan'ye nidarsanabali rayeche.

Allaha kare diyechena tomadera grhake abasthanera jayaga ebam catuspada jantura camara dbara karechena tomara jan'ye tambura byabastha. Tomara eguloke sapharakale o abasthana kale pa'o. Bherara pasama, utera babari cula o chagalera loma dbara kata asababapatra o byabaharera samagri tairi karechena eka nirdista samaya paryanta.

Allaha tomadera jan'ye srjita bastu dbara chaya kare diyechena ebam pahara samuhe tomadera jan'ye atna gopanera jayaga karechena ebam tomadera jan'ye posaka tairi kare diyechena, ya tomaderake grisma ebam bipadera samaya raksa kare. Emanibhabe tini tomadera prati sbiya anugrahera purnata dana karena, yate tomara atnasamarpana kara.
Atahpara yadi tara prstha pradarsana kare, tabe apanara kaja hala suspasta bhabe pauche deya matra.
Tara allahara anugraha cine, erapara asbikara kare ebam tadera adhikansa'i akrtajna.
Yedina ami pratyeka um'mata theke ekajana barnanakari damra karaba, takhana kapheraderake anumati deya habe na ebam tadera ta'oba o grahana kara habe na.
Yakhana jalemara ayaba pratyaksa karabe, takhana tadera theke ta laghu kara habe na ebam taderake kona abakasa deya habe na.

Musarikara yakhana ai saba bastuke dekhabe, yesabake tara allahara sathe sarika sabyasta karechila, takhana balabeh he amadera palanakarta era'i tara yara amadera serekira upadana, tomake chere amara yaderake dakatama. Takhana ora taderake balabeh tomara mithyabadi.
Sedina tara allahara samane atnasamarpana karabe ebam tara ye mithya apabada dita ta bismrta habe.
Yara kaphera hayeche ebam allahara pathe badha srsti kareche, ami taderake ayabera para ayaba bariye deba. Karana, tara asanti srsti karata.

Sedina pratyeka um'matera madhye ami ekajana barnanakari damra karaba tadera bipakse tadera madhya theke'i ebam tadera bisaye apanake saksi sbarupa upasthapana karaba. Ami apanara prati grantha nayila karechi yeti emana ye ta pratyeka bastura suspasta barnana, hedayeta, rahamata ebam musalamanadera jan'ye susambada.

Allaha n'yayaparayanata, sadacarana ebam atniya-sbajanake dana karara adesa dena ebam tini aslilata, asangata kaja ebam abadhyata karate barana karena. Tini tomadera upadesa dena yate tomara smarana rakha.
Allahara name angikara karara para se angikara purna kara ebam pakapaki kasama karara para ta bhanga karo na, athaca tomara allahake jamina karecha. Tomara ya kara allaha ta janena.

Tomara ai mahilara mata hayo na, ye parisramera para kata suta tukaro tukaro kare chire phele, tomara nijedera kasamasamuhake parasparika prabancanara bahana rupe grahana kara ejan'ye ye, an'ya dala apeksa eka dala adhika ksamatabana haye yaya. Etadbara to allaha sudhu tomadera pariksa karena. Allaha abasya'i kiyamatera dina prakasa kare debena, ye bisaye tomara kalaha karate.
Allaha iccha karale tomadera saba'ike eka jati kare dite paratena, kintu tini yake iccha bipathagami karena ebam yake iccha patha pradarsana karena. Tomara ya kara se bisaye abasya'i jijnasita habe.

Tomara sbiya kasamasamuhake parasparika kalaha dbandbera bahana karo na. Ta hale drrhabhabe pratisthita ha'oyara para pa phasake yabe ebam tomara sastira sbada asbadana karabe e karane ye, tomara amara pathe badha dana karecha ebam tomadera kathora sasti habe.
Tomara allahara angikarera binimaye saman'ya mulya grahana karo na. Niscaya allahara kache ya ache, ta uttama tomadera jan'ye, yadi tomara jnani ha'o.

Tomadera kache ya ache nihsesa haye yabe ebam allahara kache ya ache, kakhana'o ta sesa habe na. Yara sabara kare, ami taderake prapya pratidana deba tadera uttama karmera pratidana sbarupa ya tara karata.
Ye satkarma sampadana kare ebam se imanadara, purusa hoka kimba nari ami take pabitra jibana dana karaba ebam pratidane taderake tadera uttama kajera karane prapya puraskara deba ya tara karata.
Ata'eba, yakhana apani kora'ana patha karena takhana bitarita sayatana theke allahara asraya grahana karuna.
Tara adhipatya cale na tadera upara yara bisbasa sthapana kare ebam apana palana kartara upara bharasa rakhe.
Tara adhipatya to tadera upara'i cale, yara take bandhu mane kare ebam yara take ansidara mane.

Ebam yakhana ami eka ayatera sthale an'ya ayata upasthita kari ebam allaha ya abatirna karena tini'i se samparke bhala janena; takhana tara baleh apani to managara ukti karena; baram tadera adhikansa loka'i jane na.
Baluna, eke pabitra pheresata palanakartara paksa theke niscita satyasaha nayila karechena, yate muminaderake pratisthita karena ebam eta musalamanadera jan'ye patha nirdesa o su-sambada sbarupa.
Ami to bhalabhabe'i jani ye, tara baleh take janaika byakti siksa deya. Yara dike tara ingita kare, tara bhasa to arabi naya ebam e kora'ana pariskara arabi bhasaya.
Yara allahara kathaya bisbasa kare na, taderake allaha patha pradarsana karena na ebam tadera jan'ye rayeche yantranadayaka sasti.
Mithya kebala tara racana kare, yara allahara nidarsane bisbasa kare na ebam tara'i mithyabadi.

Yara upara jabaradasti kara haya ebam tara antara bisbase atala thake se byatita ye ke'u bisbasi ha'oyara para allahate abisbasi haya ebam kupharira jan'ya mana um'mukta kare deya tadera upara apatita habe allahara gayaba ebam tadera jan'ye rayeche sasti.
Eta e jan'ye ye, tara parthiba jibanake parakalera ca'ite priya mane kareche ebam allaha abisbasiderake patha pradarsana karena na.
Era'i tara, allaha ta’yala edera'i antara, karna o caksura upara mohara mere diyechena ebam era'i kanda jnanahina.
Balabahulya parakale era'i ksati grasta habe.
Yara duhkha-kasta bhogera para desatyagi hayeche atahpara jehada kareche, niscaya apanara palanakarta esaba bisayera pare abasya'i ksamasila, parama dayalu.
Yedina pratyeka byakti atna-samarthane sa'oyala ja'oyaba karate karate asabe ebam pratyeka byakti tadera krtakarmera purna phala pabe ebam tadera upara juluma kara habe na.

Allaha drstanta barnana karechena ekati janapadera, ya chila nirapada o niscinta, tathaya pratyeka jayaga theke asata pracura jibanopakarana. Atahpara tara allahara neyamatera prati akrtajnata prakasa karala. Takhana allaha taderake tadera krtakarmera karane sbada asbadana karalena, ksudha o bhitira.
Tadera kache tadera madhya theke'i ekajana rasula agamana karechilena. Anantara ora tamra prati mithyaropa karala. Takhana ayaba ese tadarake pakara'o karala ebam niscita'i ora chila papacari.
Ata'eba, allaha tomaderake yesaba halala o pabitra bastu diyechena, ta tomara ahara kara ebam allahara anugrahera jan'ye krtajnata prakasa kara yadi tomara tamra'i ebadatakari haye thaka.

Abasya'i allaha tomadera jan'ye harama karechena rakta, sukarera mansa ebam ya jaba'i kale allaha chara an'yera nama uccarana kara hayeche. Atahpara ke'u simalanghana kari na haye nirupaya haye parale tabe, allaha ksamasila, parama dayalu.

Tomadera mukha theke sadharanatah yesaba mithya bera haye ase temani kare tomara allahara birud'dhe mithya apabada aropa kare bala na ye, eta halala ebam ota harama. Niscaya yara allahara birud'dhe mithya aropa kare, tadera mangala habe na.
Yatsaman'ya sukha-sambhoga bhoga kare nika. Tadera jan'ye yantranadayaka sasti rayeche.
Ihudidera jan'ye ami to kebala ta'i harama karechilama ya itipurbe apanara nikata ullekha karechi. Ami tadera prati kona juluma karini, kintu tara'i nijedera upara juluma karata.
Anantara yara ajnatabasatah manda kaja kare, atahpara ta'oba kare ebam nijeke sansodhana kare neya, apanara palanakarta esabera pare tadera jan'ye abasya'i ksamasila, dayalu.
Niscaya ibrahima chilena eka sampradayera pratika, sabakichu theke mukha phiriye eka allahara'i anugata ebam tini serakakaridera antarbhukta chilena na.
Tini tamra anugrahera prati krtajnata prakasakari chilena. Allaha tamke manonita karechilena ebam sarala pathe paricalita karechilena.
Ami tamke duniyate dana karechi kalyana ebam tini parakale'o satkarmasiladera antarbhukta.
Atahpara apanara prati pratyadesa prerana karechi ye, ibrahimera dbina anusarana karuna, yini ekanistha chilena ebam sirakakaridera antarbhukta chilena na.

Sanibara dina palana ye, nirdharana kara hayechila, ta tadera jan'ye'i yara ete matabirodha karechila. Apanara palanakarta kiyamatera dina tadera madhye phayasala karabena ye bisaye tara matabirodha karata.

Apana palanakartara pathera prati ahabana karuna jnanera katha bujhiye o upadesa suniye uttamarupe ebam tadera sathe bitarka karuna pachanda yukta panthaya. Niscaya apanara palanakarta'i ai byakti samparke bisesa bhabe jnata rayechena, ye tamra patha theke bicyuta haye pareche ebam tini'i bhala janena taderake, yara sathika pathe ache.
Ara yadi tomara pratisodha grahana kara, tabe ai parimana pratisodha grahana karabe, ye parimana tomaderake kasta deya haya. Yadi sabara kara, tabe ta sabarakaridera jan'ye uttama.
Apani sabara karabena. Apanara sabara allahara jan'ya byatita naya, tadera jan'ye duhkha karabena na ebam tadera cakrantera karane mana chota karabena na.
Niscaya allaha tadera sange achena, yara paraheyagara ebam yara satkarma kare.
